page.title: 17A DAY IN MY LIFE IN CARLISLE
page.content: I usually wake up with the radio blaring out at about seven.Last Mon- day was the same.I lay in bed reading for half an hour before getting up.I get washed before anyone else to avoid the bathroom queue.Then I go back to my room and play on my computer while the rest of the house gets up.They have breakfast before I come down for mine,usually soggy Rice Krispies.After that I go back upstairs and comb my hair.I brush my teeth again and again, ready for school. When I got home from school I had fish and chips for tea.I played cricket in the back until six.Then I went shopping with my mum and dad.When we got home I watched 'The Young Ones' on television.I went to bed and read for a while.I couldn't get to sleep so I read again.At 11.30 I finally got to sleep.
